title: Two teens arrested for fatal shooting at west Columbus Wendy's
content:
COLUMBUS, Ohio (WSYX/WTTE) -- Two teens have been arrested for their involvement in a fatal shooting at west Columbus Wednesday's on Tuesday night.
Nigel L. Jackson, 17, and Taysen R. Hixon, 15, have been charged with murder for the death of 38-year-old Edwin A. Guerrero. The victim was shot at the Wendy's restaurant on West Broad Street between Stevens and Central Avenue. He was transported to Mt. Carmel West where he later died from his injuries.
Jackson was also shot during the same shooting. He was taken to Mt. Carmel West for treatment and arrested Wednesday night after he was released.
Hixon was arrested by Columbus Police SWAT at a relative's home in Hilliard Thursday morning without incident.
We'll have more details on this developing story as they're made available.
